Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I am getting back into the UK Textadventures :-0

As I am looking into some of my games from last year I cannot for the life of me find how added images to my room descriptions..?

I am in edit mode and I am totally clueless as to where they are..? When I play my game images are showing up, but how did I add them and where are they now...?

Yikes...Sorry for such a basic posting...

Kelso
Posts.HTML:
Hi, I am getting back into the UK Textadventures :-0

As I am looking into some of my games from last year I cannot for the life of me find how added images to my room descriptions..?

I am in edit mode and I am totally clueless as to where they are..? When I play my game images are showing up, but how did I add them and where are they now...?

Yikes...Sorry for such a basic posting...

Kelso

Posts.EditableText:
Look at the feature tab in the game section and activate "Picture frame: a static....." 
Then you should be able to add pictures in the Room tab of a room
Posts.HTML:
Look at the feature tab in the game section and activate "Picture frame: a static....."
Then you should be able to add pictures in the Room tab of a room

Posts.EditableText: Way toooooo easy. Thank you so much. I am almost bald now from pulling out my hair on this Kelso
